Content.Text:
<NAME_UNKOWN>... <MYNAME>... <MYNAME>...
You worked hard today!
<PAGE>
You seem to be sleeping soundly, so just
reply to me in your dream!

<NAME_UNKOWN><MYNAME>, are you having
trouble figuring out what to do on your
farm?
Yes
No

<NAME_UNKOWN>Okay then!
I'll give you some advice!
<PAGE>
First, grow <RED>crops</RED> in your fields.
Then ship the crops to earn money.
With that money, you can buy more seeds.
<PAGE>
You're new to farm life, <MYNAME>!
Growing and shipping crops is the basis
of farm life. Just remember that!
<NAME_UNKOWN>Do you have any other questions?
What happens after I ship crops?
What other things can I do?
No, I don't have any questions.

<NAME_UNKOWN>The day after you ship crops, you will
receive the money for them. Save up
money, then go shopping!
<PAGE>
There is a <BLUE>General Store</BLUE> in town
where you can buy the things you want.
<PAGE>
Grow crops, ship them, earn money, buy
items! Just keep repeating that cycle,
and you're in business as a farmer!

You can also forage for items from the
mountain, forest and river.
<PAGE>
You can capture critters like
butterflies and locusts.
<PAGE>
Foraged items and captured critters can
be shipped to earn money.

Got that?
Well then, get a good night's sleep!
Sweet dreams!

<NAME_UNKOWN>... <MYNAME>... <MYNAME>...
You worked hard today!
<PAGE>
You seem to be sleeping soundly, so just
listen to me in your dream!

<NAME_UNKOWN>You've been doing a great
job growing crops recently, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
And by the way, the <BLUE>General Store</BLUE>
sells <GREEN>grass seeds</GREEN> too.
Try growing grass to feed your cows!

<NAME_UNKOWN>You've been doing a great job catching
critters recently, <MYNAME>!
Did you know you can catch different
<PAGE>
critters during the morning, daytime,
and nighttime? So try it at different
times!

<NAME_UNKOWN>You've been doing a really great job
foraging for items recently, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
By the way, you can store items that you
don't ship in the <BLUE>Storage</BLUE> or
<BLUE>Refrigerator</BLUE> of your house.
<PAGE>
Once you put something in the <BLUE>Storage</BLUE> or
<BLUE>Refrigerator</BLUE>, you can get it out
whenever you need it! Give it a try!

<NAME_UNKOWN>You've been doing a really
great job taming wild animals recently,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Did you know that you will encounter
different animals during the morning,
daytime, and nighttime?
<PAGE>
And that you can feed them? Try giving
them different things to find out what
they like!

<NAME_UNKOWN>Well, <MYNAME>, recently
you've really been... uhhh... ummm...
<PAGE>
...working really hard on activities
other than farming. Very impressive!
<PAGE>
But you DO have a farm after all,
so why not grow crops?
Give it a try! It's fun!

<NAME_UNKOWN>Bye, <MYNAME>.
Keep up the good work tomorrow!
Sweet dreams!

<NAME_UNKOWN>... <MYNAME>... <MYNAME>...
You worked hard today!
<PAGE>
You seem to be sleeping soundly, so just
listen to me in your dream!

<NAME_UNKOWN>How are the cows you got from Neil
doing?
<PAGE>
You can get milk from cows! You can ship
the milk to earn money, or use it in
cooking.
<PAGE>
If you earn enough money, you can buy
another cow! Cows are so cute, I'm sure
you'll love having them, <MYNAME>!

<NAME_UNKOWN>Okay, <MYNAME>, good luck with your cows!
And sweet dreams!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... <MYNAME>...
You worked hard today!
<PAGE>
You seem to be sleeping soundly, so just
listen to me in your dream!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As Dunhill mentioned to you, there's a
Crop Festival on the 30th of this month!
<PAGE>
If you win, you will be able to sell the
crops you grow for more money!
You should enter and try to win it!
<PAGE>
If you don't have any crops right now,
start growing them tomorrow and you can
harvest them in time for the festival!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bye, <MYNAME>.
Keep up the good work tomorrow!
Sweet dreams!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... <MYNAME>...
You worked hard today!
<PAGE>
You seem to be sleeping soundly, so just
listen to me in your dream!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
First of all... congratulations on
winning the Crop Festival!
I'm so happy for you!
<PAGE>
You've made so much progress as a farmer
over the past month, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
There's no more for me to teach you.
If you follow the advice I've given you
so far, you can revitalize the village!
<PAGE>
Now your career as a farmer is really
starting, <MYNAME>.
I'll be cheering you on! Do your best!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you enjoyed the past month of
farming? I certainly hope so!
<PAGE>
You should have learned all you need to
know about farming by now, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
There's no more for me to teach you.
If you follow the advice I've given you
so far, you can revitalize the village!
<PAGE>
Now your career as a farmer is really
starting, <MYNAME>.
I'll be cheering you on! Do your best!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bye, <MYNAME>.
Sweet dreams!
